nodes.description: Daallo Airlines航班在摩加迪沙机场起飞后发生爆炸和火灾，机舱出现大洞
nodes.support_text: An explosion and fire blew a gaping hole in a commercial airliner, forcing it to make an emergency landing at Mogadishu's international airport late Tuesday...

nodes.description: 飞行员确认听到爆炸声并判断为炸弹袭击
nodes.support_text: The pilot said he thought it was a bomb. An aviation expert... said the damage was consistent with an explosive device.

nodes.description: 航空安全专家通过机舱损伤照片分析爆炸装置可能性
nodes.support_text: Goglia said there are only two things that could have caused a hole... a bomb or a pressurization blowout...

nodes.description: 15英里外发现15英里外坠落的严重烧伤老人遗体
nodes.support_text: Eyewitnesses claim the badly burned body of an elderly man fell to earth about 15 miles away...

nodes.description: 机组人员安全降落并开始紧急撤离74名乘客和机组
nodes.support_text: 74 passengers and crew of the plane were evacuated after the plane made a safe landing...

nodes.description: 摩加迪沙航空官员确认两人轻微受伤但未确认全员安全
nodes.support_text: Somali aviation official Ali Mohamoud said two people were slightly injured as 74 passengers and crew... were evacuated...

nodes.description: 塞尔维亚飞行员详细描述驾驶舱失压但成功返航
nodes.support_text: Vodopivec said... the flight controls were not damaged so I could return and land at the airport...

nodes.description: 联合国驻索马里副大使在社交媒体记录机舱内爆炸和结构损毁
nodes.support_text: Awale Kullane... wrote 'heard a loud noise and couldn't see anything but smoke for a few seconds.'

nodes.description: 前美国国家运输安全委员会专家分析黑烟和机舱剥离痕迹
nodes.support_text: Goglia said the photos appear to show black soot around the aircraft skin that is peeled back...

nodes.description: 乘客目击爆炸后机舱出现火舌和氧气面罩启动
nodes.support_text: Passengers also posted a video showing some passengers putting on oxygen masks inside the plane.

nodes.description: 乘客拍摄视频记录紧急撤离过程和机舱内部情况
nodes.support_text: Passengers also posted a video showing some passengers putting on oxygen masks inside the plane.

nodes.description: 飞行控制系统被爆炸和火灾严重损坏
nodes.support_text: An explosion and fire blew a gaping hole in a commercial airliner, forcing it to make an emergency landing...

nodes.description: 紧急事件安全结束并完成全员撤离
nodes.support_text: 74 passengers and crew of the plane were evacuated after the plane made a safe landing...

nodes.description: 两种可能原因（bomb/pressurization blowout）导致飞机孔洞形成
nodes.support_text: Goglia said there are only two things that could have caused a hole... a bomb or a pressurization blowout...

nodes.description: Mohamed Ali向美联社讲述爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: Mohamed Ali向美联社讲述爆炸事件

nodes.description: Mohamed Ali确认乘客跌落报告
nodes.support_text: Mohamed Ali确认乘客跌落报告

nodes.description: 视频展示乘客佩戴氧气面罩
nodes.support_text: 视频展示乘客佩戴氧气面罩
